name: Gearkeeper Construct
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: The gearkeeper is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Rapid Shifting
text: Opportunity attacks made against the gearkeeper have disadvantage.

trait.name: Whirling Blades
text: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the gearkeeper takes 4 (1d8) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The gearkeeper makes two Arm Blade attacks, or one Arm Blade attack and one Spear Launcher attack.

action.name: Arm Blade
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (3d8 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear Launcher
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is knocked prone.

action.name: Shrapnel Blast (Recharge 6)
text: The gearkeeper jettisons a spray of jagged metal in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description: Source: Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 290
